description: This is a market on whether more or less than 221 total points will be scored in Suns v. Clippers: Western Conference Finals Game 3, scheduled to take place on June 24, 2021, 9:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to “More” if more than 221 total points are scored in the game, and “Less” if less than 221 total points are scored in the game. If exactly 221 total points are scored in the game, then the market will resolve to 50 cents “More” and 50 cents “Less.” If the match is postponed to a date on or before July 1, 2021, 9:00 PM ET, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after July 1, 2021, 9:00 PM ET or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
